entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Grand Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 31. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 34.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
